item.description: Aspire Dance Night Meet Up invites you to a great evening of party adventure, romance and dance fun in the Ballroom at the Knights of Columbus Salem, Mass. The dance party hours are 7:30 to 11:30 PM with a mini lesson for 45 minutes and the instruction will run through out the summer. Smart casual attire. The introductory dance & lesson admission is $10. Couples and singles are welcome and partners are not necessary. We will be dancing to a variety of music styles in Latin, partner & line salsa, east & west coast,and country western. Plenty of room for everyone and bring lots of your friends to. We have a great dance floor, plenty of seating and large capacity air conditioning system. Hope to see you soon and bring lots of your friends for a great night out.
item.name: Singles and Couples Dance Party, Salem, Mass.
